passives.name: Reverberate
passives.effects: After 2 seconds from the start of the combat phase in each round, gain {{as|5 '''bonus''' health}} per {{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.

passives.name: Resonate
passives.effects: Basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} deal {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 2% of your '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.

passives.name: Rumble
passives.effects: {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} an enemy champion generates 25 stacks of ''Reverberation'' for 10 seconds, stacking up to 100 times and refreshing {{tip|on-hit}} as well as on subsequent immobilizations. At '''maximum''' stacks and upon {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} an enemy, your on-hit effects are applied to them 3 times.

effects_structured.raw: After 2 seconds from the start of the combat phase in each round, gain {{as 5 '''bonus''' health}} per {{as 1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}.
Basic attacks {{tip on-hit}} deal {{as 10 magic damage}} {{as (+ 2% of your '''bonus''' health)}} {{as '''bonus''' magic damage}}.

{{tip Immobilize Immobilizing}} an enemy champion generates 25 stacks of ''Reverberation'' for 10 seconds, stacking up to 100 times and refreshing {{tip on-hit}} as well as on subsequent immobilizations
At '''maximum''' stacks and upon {{tip immobilize immobilizing}} an enemy, your on-hit effects are applied to them 3 times.
